input.sentences: a group of girls got together to prepare a large meal .
all kinds of delicious food was prepared .
then everyone spent time together for a group picture .
everyone had a great time at the party .
at the end of the party | everyone ate cupcakes .
output.sentences: My girls are working hard to prepare the meal!
They prepared all kinds of food.
We decided to memorialize the time spent together with a picture.
Everyone had such a great time at the party.
Everyone had so much to eat at the party, we didn't even have any cupcakes left!
